comment.author: 77879774@N08
comment._content:
This is my father who was killed in a snow storm near Huron, Ohio in 1929.  I was a baby and never knew him, much to my lifelong regret.  All I have are pictures and this is one I have never seen before.  It means a lot to me.
Joanne McGinn Hibdon
Jefferson City, Mo

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/77879774@N08] I am glad you found it. Did you find the other one of him we have posted?
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 77879774@N08
comment._content: Yes, I did.......thank you so much.
